General.Name: Dosilicon Co Ltd
General.Description: Dosilicon Co., Ltd., a fabless memory solution company, designs, produces, and sells memory chips worldwide. The company offers NAND flash, NOR flash, and dynamic random-access memory chips, as well as multiple chip package, transistors, and low power double data rate SDRAM (LPDDR) series products. It also acts as a writer manufacturer. Its products have applications in the network communication, internet of things, industrial control, and monitoring security rate sectors. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: L4A-F5, Hongqiao World Center, Shanghai, China
